name: local-to-cloud-sync

scripts.start: npm run build && npx electron dist/main.js
scripts.dev: npm run build && NODE_ENV=development npx electron .
scripts.build: tsc && mkdir -p dist/engine/storage && cp engine/storage/schema.sql dist/engine/storage/ && cp renderer/index.html dist/renderer/ && cp renderer/styles.css dist/renderer/

description: A simple local to cloud notes sync desktop app
